alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 30 at 9:56PM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...A strong cold front will bring a band of moderate to heavy snow through northern Utah after midnight Friday, ending by 11 AM. This heavy band of snow will last 2-4 hours in most locations. Significant impacts are expected to travel including the Friday morning commute across all of northern Utah. Strong, gusty winds near the front may also cause blowing and drifting of snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
